video.title: Battle Creek
video.synopsis: A polished FBI agent must team up with a cynical cop when he's dispatched to Battle Creek, Michigan, to set up an office at the local precinct.

episodes.synopsis: When a sophisticated FBI agent comes to town, it upsets the fragile world of an old-school detective who must partner with him to solve a case.
episodes.title: The Battle Creek Way

episodes.synopsis: Russ and Font try to solve the murder of a man found naked in the woods with maple syrup in his lungs; Font makes a discovery about his migraines.
episodes.title: Syruptitious

episodes.synopsis: The police and Milt investigate the murder of a woman killed at her home in a poor neighborhood, then learn that she stood to inherit a fortune.
episodes.title: Heirlooms

episodes.synopsis: When a police dog finds heroin in a fourth grader's backpack, Milt and Russ try to find the source of the drugs; Russ sends Jacocks on a mission.
episodes.title: Man's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: When the commander's house burns down in a fire that looks like arson, the police and FBI team up to investigate; Holly receives an anonymous gift.
episodes.title: Old Flames

episodes.synopsis: During an annual breakfast celebration, the mayor and school mascot are shot in a complicated assassination attempt that has no clear target.
episodes.title: Cereal Killer

episodes.synopsis: Russ visits a counterfeiting expert in prison when her partner in crime is murdered and a million dollars goes missing.
episodes.title: Mama's Boy

episodes.synopsis: When Guz's adopted son, Danny, realizes that the man jailed for murdering his parents may be innocent, Milt reopens the case; Holly has a secret past.
episodes.title: Old Wounds

episodes.synopsis: Font recognizes a man from the FBI's "Most Wanted" list who is presumed dead; Brady and Milt push Russ to ask Holly out.
episodes.title: Gingerbread Man

episodes.synopsis: A convict due to be released in a matter of days escapes from prison and takes Russ hostage. Milt, the FBI and the police rush to the rescue.
episodes.title: Stockholm

episodes.synopsis: When Russ and Font respond to a crime that offers few clues, Milt calls in a favor that gets him suspended; Holly's new beau refuses to get physical.
episodes.title: The Hand-Off

episodes.synopsis: Russ reconnects with his youth when he and Milt look into the death of a high school football coach and town icon; Russ and Holly take a step forward.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: When Milt survives a car bombing and enlists Russ to find his would-be assassin, Russ learns a key piece of information about Milt's past.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Devil
